title: Beautiful 1BR in Black Rock!! Cypress Apts.
app_fee: $50.00 application fee. Good credit and good income are required to qualify.
posting_body: ['Description', 'Mid-Rise Building with Elevator', 'Luxury apartment for rent in Black Rock, CT.', 'Newly renovated 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment.', 'Heat, hot water and gas included!', 'Laundry and free gym located in the building.', 'Comes with parking located in our private lot.', 'Cats are welcomed!', 'Cypress Apartments are located just minutes from the center of Black Rock, CT.', "Within a short distance of New England's finest beaches.", "Boating facilities, the Bridgeport Bluefish, The Sound Tigers, Harbor Yard, theaters, The University of Bridgeport and Captain's Cove are only a short distance away.", 'Minutes from the Fairfield Metro train station and I95.', 'Fifty Five miles from New York City.', 'Features', '*Cable ready', '*Microwave', '*Hardwood floors', '*Air conditioning', '*Refrigerator', '*Dishwasher', '*Oven / range', '*Heat - gas', '*Laundry room', '*Elevator', '*Private Parking', '*Storage units', '*Fitness center', '$50 application Fee.', 'Background check.', 'Good credit and good income are required to qualify.', 'Call Alyson 203-520-6372']
